item.title: Miracle Fusion Necklace with Agate and Howlite M01
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
Among Miracle's beautiful necklaces, this absolutely stunning piece can surely be referred to as not only authentic, atmospheric and refined, but also modern and contemporary. This necklace sees an impeccable implementation of the artist's creative vision, as well as an incredible selection of materials, including semi-precious violet agate, brass chain accents, as well as stylish pairs of elongated blue howlite beads. The necklace is built around a large circular chain, giving it a bit of a modern choker vibe.

The post Miracle Fusion Necklace with Agate and Howlite M01 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
Among Miracle’s beautiful necklaces, this absolutely stunning piece can surely be referred to as not only authentic, atmospheric and refined, but also modern and contemporary. This necklace sees an impeccable implementation of the artist’s creative vision, as well as an incredible selection of materials, including semi-precious violet agate, brass chain accents, as well as stylish pairs of elongated blue howlite beads. The necklace is built around a large circular chain, giving it a bit of a modern choker vibe.

Materials

Agate is a magnificent  stone that is believed to have been one of humanity’s earliest possessions. According to researchers, Agate was mined in Ancient Egypt as early as 3500 B.C. As per Agate’s properties, it is regarded as providing a harmonizing influence. It is believed to help with balancing of emotional, physical and intellectual endeavors, harmonizing the Ying and Yang. A soothing and calming stone, Agate is thought to bring great strength gradually and is said to aid with the acceptances of oneself/building self confidence. It is also believed that Agate can improve concentration and analytical abilities, resulting in newfound practical solutions.

Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Miracle

Miracle is a unique brand that is based in refined, sophisticated and feminine accessories. Accessories that combine a sense of jewelry tradition with notions of elegant, modern and contemporary jewelry. Truly a designer brand, Miracle seems to embody the commitment to a woman’s passion for outstanding accessories, creating undeniably beautiful pieces, from necklaces to earrings and bracelets. Miracle’s apt selection of favorite materials includes howlite, quartz, cat’s eye and agate. Taking a piece of Miracle’s jewelry into a hand, one can’t help but acknowledge the brand’s unmistakable original style that combines true refinement with sensual elegance.

The post Miracle Fusion Necklace with Agate and Howlite M01 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Miracle Princess Necklace with Nacre and Agate M05
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
A stunning Miracle necklace, the Princess pays a tribute to jewelry traditions with a sophisticated and fashionable, yet modern design. Incredibly stylish, subtle and elegant, this necklace is impressive with its detailing and is carrying an unmistakable sense of presence and refinement. An apt selection of materials for this necklace includes agate, mother of pearl (nacre), howlite and reps ribbon. One might infer with absolute confidence that this necklace will favorably complement a number of your fashionable looks.

The post Miracle Princess Necklace with Nacre and Agate M05 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
A stunning Miracle necklace, the Princess pays a tribute to jewelry traditions with a sophisticated and fashionable, yet modern design. Incredibly stylish, subtle and elegant, this necklace is impressive with its detailing and is carrying an unmistakable sense of presence and refinement. An apt selection of materials for this necklace includes agate, mother of pearl (nacre), howlite and reps ribbon. One might infer with absolute confidence that this necklace will favorably complement a number of your fashionable looks.

Materials

Agate is a magnificent  stone that is believed to have been one of humanity’s earliest possessions. According to researchers, Agate was mined in Ancient Egypt as early as 3500 B.C. As per Agate’s properties, it is regarded as providing a harmonizing influence. It is believed to help with balancing of emotional, physical and intellectual endeavors, harmonizing the Ying and Yang. A soothing and calming stone, Agate is thought to bring great strength gradually and is said to aid with the acceptances of oneself/building self confidence. It is also believed that Agate can improve concentration and analytical abilities, resulting in newfound practical solutions.

Mother of Pearl (Nacre) has been used in jewelry for thousands of years, with the earliest known pieces attributable to ancient Egyptians and Sumerians. East Asian and Islamic art has also used nacre for beautiful inlay work. Mother of Pearl has become extremely popular in Europe during the Victorian Era. This organic gemstone belongs to a small group that includes coral, amber, jet, ivory and, of course, pearl. Mother of Pearl is often thought of as encouraging prosperity, offering motherly and soothing protection, while promoting intuition and imagination.

Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Miracle

Miracle is a unique brand that is based in refined, sophisticated and feminine accessories. Accessories that combine a sense of jewelry tradition with notions of elegant, modern and contemporary jewelry. Truly a designer brand, Miracle seems to embody the commitment to a woman’s passion for outstanding accessories, creating undeniably beautiful pieces, from necklaces to earrings and bracelets. Miracle’s apt selection of favorite materials includes howlite, quartz, cat’s eye and agate. Taking a piece of Miracle’s jewelry into a hand, one can’t help but acknowledge the brand’s unmistakable original style that combines true refinement with sensual elegance.

The post Miracle Princess Necklace with Nacre and Agate M05 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Miracle Sun Necklace with Cat’s Eye, Howlite and Pearl M08
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
This absolutely stunning necklace is one of Miracle's most beautiful creations. Just like the sun itself, this original piece is radiant, due to an exceptional Cat's Eye centerpiece. Cat's Eye, in turn, is wonderfully complemented by pearls and stunning contrasting blue howlite beads. In line with Miracle's aesthetic, The Sun Necklace is authentic, atmospheric and refined, while at the same time feeling modern and contemporary. The Sun Necklace combines a unique selection of materials with outstanding artistic vision and impeccable execution.

The post Miracle Sun Necklace with Cat’s Eye, Howlite and Pearl M08 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
This absolutely stunning necklace is one of Miracle’s most beautiful creations. Just like the sun itself, this original piece is radiant, due to an exceptional Cat’s Eye centerpiece. Cat’s Eye, in turn, is wonderfully complemented by pearls and stunning contrasting blue howlite beads. In line with Miracle’s aesthetic, The Sun Necklace is authentic, atmospheric and refined, while at the same time feeling modern and contemporary. The Sun Necklace combines a unique selection of materials with outstanding artistic vision and impeccable execution.

Materials

Cat’s Eye is a stone of good fortune and good luck, while at the same time being a stone of protection. Often regarded as a prosperity stone as well, Cat’s Eye is believed to bring happiness and serenity, as well as generosity and optimism. As mentioned earlier, this stone is attributed with an ability to improve luck and protect from accidents, akin to a cat always landing on its feet. Cat’s Eye stone is also thought to be able to improve one’s perception of others’ intentions, as well as enhance intuition.

Pearls are considered to be gems of nourishment and nurturing, but are symbolic of innocence, loyalty and purity. These gems are believed to enhance personal integrity. Pearls are great symbols of femininity as well, helping to connect and find a meaning and purpose of the “true self”. As is the case with many other crystals and stones, pearls come in different colors, each with its own properties. For instance, a rare black pearls is a lucky gem. Cream colored pearls are for success. Pink pearls are believed to bring happiness, while white pearls are associated with good health.

Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Miracle

Miracle is a unique brand that is based in refined, sophisticated and feminine accessories. Accessories that combine a sense of jewelry tradition with notions of elegant, modern and contemporary jewelry. Truly a designer brand, Miracle seems to embody the commitment to a woman’s passion for outstanding accessories, creating undeniably beautiful pieces, from necklaces to earrings and bracelets. Miracle’s apt selection of favorite materials includes howlite, quartz, cat’s eye and agate. Taking a piece of Miracle’s jewelry into a hand, one can’t help but acknowledge the brand’s unmistakable original style that combines true refinement with sensual elegance.

The post Miracle Sun Necklace with Cat’s Eye, Howlite and Pearl M08 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Tsumi Blue Coral and Howlite Neclace TS182
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
This absolutely fantastic necklace made of howlite, glass, hematite and blue coral is inspired by tribal customs and traditions, as well as ritual dances. An adjustable necklace clasp allows to vary the length of this item within 52cm (20.47"). This luxurious necklace is made with a number of small triangular coral beads, with authentic traces of cutting and an absolutely unique natural blue hue.  Smooth facets of the coral beads are pleasant to the touch, while their arrangement provides the necklace with a sense of genuine volume that is rare of this type of jewelry. This kind of blue coral is mined only on the shoals of the Gulf of Biafra, located on African West Coast near Cameroon. Overall, blue triangular corals are complemented with elliptical howlite beads giving this necklace a feeling of unique and authentic charm, as well as a true sense of presence.

Materials: Howlite, Blue Corals, Glass, Metal Elements, Sterling Silver Logo Charm. Length adjustable up to 52 cm (20.47").

The post Tsumi Blue Coral and Howlite Neclace TS182 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
This absolutely fantastic necklace made of howlite, glass, hematite and blue coral is inspired by tribal customs and traditions, as well as ritual dances. An adjustable necklace clasp allows to vary the length of this item within 52cm (20.47″). This luxurious necklace is made with a number of small triangular coral beads, with authentic traces of cutting and an absolutely unique natural blue hue.  Smooth facets of the coral beads are pleasant to the touch, while their arrangement provides the necklace with a sense of genuine volume that is rare of this type of jewelry. This kind of blue coral is mined only on the shoals of the Gulf of Biafra, located on African West Coast near Cameroon. Overall, blue triangular corals are complemented with elliptical howlite beads giving this necklace a feeling of unique and authentic charm, as well as a true sense of presence.

Materials

Since the ancient times coral is a traditional gift of protection for the expectant mother or a newborn child. Coral is also associated with emotional healing. Blue coral in particular is believed to have an ability of reconnecting oneself to one’s inner child, providing stability, reducing fear and finding inner peace. Coral is also believed to extend its protection to anyone living, traveling or working by/in the sea. Since coral is of organic origin, it is often thought of as an aid in rekindling one’s relationship with nature and its wonders, stimulating creativity and optimism, as well as enabling it’s bearer to enjoy life to the fullest. It may be the reason why, all around the world, coral has been used as jewelry for at least thousands of years.

Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of one’s ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Tsumi

Tsumi is a brand born from the love of fashion, as well as an inherent need to be original and unique. Each Tsumi accessory is infused by a touch of authentic ethnic flair and is inspired by joyful memories of traveling the world. Tsumi accessories are crafted with an incredible skill, while remaining visionary and creative pieces of contemporary jewelry.

Most of Tsumi accessories are made in either limited quantity or in one unique specimen. Tsumi is also synonymous with an exceptional selection of original and rare materials used to create their stylish accessories. These include semi-precious stones, corals, pearls and crystals, making Tsumi jewelry not only an embodiment of original style, but also an experience.

The post Tsumi Blue Coral and Howlite Neclace TS182 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Tsumi Howlite and Hematite Necklace TS188
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
This charming necklace is created in orange/black color scheme with blue accents and is bound to complement some of your finest looks. Quite a bit atmospheric and airy, this beautiful piece carries a playful feeling of lightness and easiness that is well accentuated by several rows of chains, framing the bottom of the necklace. The length of the necklace can be conveniently adjusted up to 65 cm (25.59"). The creation of this beautiful accessory is inspired by tribal customs and traditions, as well as ritual dances. Aptly, the choice of materials includes howlite, hematite and bone, as well metal elements and a sterling silver logo charm. Markedly, howlite is one of the earliest minded minerals to be used in jewelry-making, highly appreciated in the ancient Middle East.

Materials: Hematite, Howlite, Bone, Metal Chains, Sterling Silver Logo Charm. Length adjustable up to 65 cm (25.59").

The post Tsumi Howlite and Hematite Necklace TS188 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
This charming necklace is created in orange/black color scheme with blue accents and is bound to complement some of your finest looks. Quite a bit atmospheric and airy, this beautiful piece carries a playful feeling of lightness and easiness that is well accentuated by several rows of chains, framing the bottom of the necklace. The length of the necklace can be conveniently adjusted up to 65 cm (25.59″). The creation of this beautiful accessory is inspired by tribal customs and traditions, as well as ritual dances. Aptly, the choice of materials includes howlite, hematite and bone, as well metal elements and a sterling silver logo charm. Markedly, howlite is one of the earliest minded minerals to be used in jewelry-making, highly appreciated in the ancient Middle East.

Materials

Hematite is one of the prettiest and most unique crystals used in jewelry accessories. This crystal provides a unique combination of shiny charisma, while retaining the ability to remain reserved. It is one of the few magnetic crystals the structure of which is dominated by iron. Hematite is often referred to as a ‘seeker crystal’ that helps one find a new path or approach to gain something you desire, but not yet posses. Hematite crystals are thought to have great grounding and balancing effect, as well as serving to stimulate mind, memory, sometimes evoking deep thought.

Since the ancient times, Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of one’s ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Tsumi

Tsumi is a brand born from the love of fashion, as well as an inherent need to be original and unique. Each Tsumi accessory is infused by a touch of authentic ethnic flair and is inspired by joyful memories of traveling the world. Tsumi accessories are crafted with an incredible skill, while remaining visionary and creative pieces of contemporary jewelry.

Most of Tsumi accessories are made in either limited quantity or in one unique specimen. Tsumi is also synonymous with an exceptional selection of original and rare materials used to create their stylish accessories. These include semi-precious stones, corals, pearls and crystals, making Tsumi jewelry not only an embodiment of original style, but also an experience.

The post Tsumi Howlite and Hematite Necklace TS188 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Tsumi One-Of-A-Kind Azure Agate Necklace TS181
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
This one-of-a-kind accessory is inspired by tribal customs and ritual dancing. Minimalist and beautiful, this atmospheric necklace is adorned with a large azure agate. The structure of this unique stone is reminiscent of ocean waves as seen from a bird's eye view. Adjustable chain allows to vary the length of the necklace up to 55cm (21.65"). Howlite, metal and a sterling silver charm complement azure agate in this original and stylish composition.

The post Tsumi One-Of-A-Kind Azure Agate Necklace TS181 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
This one-of-a-kind accessory is inspired by tribal customs and ritual dancing. Minimalist and beautiful, this atmospheric necklace is adorned with a large azure agate. The structure of this unique stone is reminiscent of ocean waves as seen from a bird’s eye view. Adjustable chain allows to vary the length of the necklace up to 55cm (21.65″). Howlite, metal and a sterling silver charm complement azure agate in this original and stylish composition.

Materials

Agate is a magnificent  stone that is believed to have been one of humanity’s earliest possessions. According to researchers, Agate was mined in Ancient Egypt as early as 3500 B.C. As per Agate’s properties, it is regarded as providing a harmonizing influence. It is believed to help with balancing of emotional, physical and intellectual endeavors, harmonizing the Ying and Yang forces of the universe. A soothing and calming stone, Agate is thought to bring great strength gradually. This stone is said to aid with the acceptances of oneself, building self confidence. It is also believed that Agate can improve concentration and analytical abilities, resulting in newfound practical solutions.

About Tsumi

Tsumi is a brand born from the love of fashion, as well as an inherent need to be original and unique. Each Tsumi accessory is infused by a touch of authentic ethnic flair and is inspired by joyful memories of traveling the world. Tsumi accessories are crafted with an incredible skill, while remaining visionary and creative pieces of contemporary jewelry.

Most of Tsumi accessories are made in either limited quantity or in one unique specimen. Tsumi is also synonymous with an exceptional selection of original and rare materials used to create their stylish accessories. These include semi-precious stones, corals, pearls and crystals, making Tsumi jewelry not only an embodiment of original style, but also an experience.

The post Tsumi One-Of-A-Kind Azure Agate Necklace TS181 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
